titleStmt.title: The state of the future life, and the present's order to it consider'd by Tho. White, Gent.
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, 1593-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for John Ridley ...,

notesStmt.note: Pages 2-5 and 66-71 are tightly bound in filmed copy. Pages from beginning-15 and 60-79 photographed from British Library copy and inserted at the end.
